con:config.script:
import static java.util.UUID.randomUUID
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("groupdefinitionkey", randomUUID() as String)

con:restRequest.name: PutGroupItemWithNoParam

con:configuration.content:
Authentication
HubExchange uses an API key or a digital signature (depending upon the API). Both identify an account as a Windosor and ExactTarget account.

Data Access
Stores ExactTarget user credentials outside of Windsor. Stores Windsor data at ExactTarget.com.

Objects Accessed:
Windsor holds an OAuth token within the app on the mobile device. A user could revoke this token inside ExactTarget if they wish.
No group definition found with the name ${#TestCase#groupdefinitionkey}

con:testStep.name: PutListingbyListingIdNoParam (IDs are Zero so No entires Made)

con:restRequest.name: PutListingbyListingIdNoParam (IDs are Zero so No entires Made)
con:restRequest.con:request: { "HXApplicationID": "${#TestCase#listingid}", "FuelApplicationID": "${#TestCase#appid}", "applicationName": "AspDotNetStorefront eCommerce Connector", "partnerName": "Windsor Circle", "iconURL": "aspdotnetstorefront.jpg", "logoURL": "aspdotnetstorefront-small.jpg", "longDescription": "uEasilly connect and sync your AspDotNetStorefront customer, product, and purchase data", "shortDescription": "uEasilly connect and sync your AspDotNetStorefront customer, product, and purchase data", "releaseDate": "2013-01-07T00:00:00", "priceHTML": "uPlease contact vendor.", "listingDescription": "ua listing desc here", "partnerWebsite": "http://somewebsite", "partnerPhone": "31u7-555-5555", "partnerPhoneInternational": "p", "partnerEmail": "Mahesh" }
